Title: Specifies which issues juries containing alternate jurors may deliberate on
Summary: Specifies that juries containing alternate jurors shall deliberate on all issues submitted to the jury at the outset of deliberations or in the case of bifurcated trials, such juries shall deliberate on all issues submitted to the jury from the outset of the second trial.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to specifying which issues juries containing alternate jurors may deliberate on
